cookies.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how AI Productivity Hub uses cookies or similar technologies on aiprod.app.
cookies.section1.body: We do not use advertising cookies or third-party tracking cookies. The app may use essential technical mechanisms required for authentication and basic functionality.
cookies.section1.title: 1. Do We Use Cookies?
cookies.section2.body: We use Plausible Analytics to understand aggregate usage and improve the product. Plausible is privacy-friendly and does not use invasive tracking or third-party advertising cookies.
cookies.section2.title: 2. Analytics
cookies.section3.body: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Disabling certain cookies may affect your ability to log in or use some features.
cookies.section3.title: 3. Managing Cookies
cookies.section4.body: If you have questions about this Cookie Policy, contact us at:
cookies.section4.title: 4. Contact
cookies.title: Cookie Policy
dailySuccessSystem.avg7d.label: Avg last 7 days
dailySuccessSystem.evening.aiSuggestHelp: AI looks at your tasks & notes to guess a realistic score. You can still adjust it.
dailySuccessSystem.evening.description: Capture how your day went. The AI will turn it into wins, lessons, and improvements for tomorrow.
dailySuccessSystem.evening.questionDay.p: What you got done, what derailed you, your energy, distractions, etc.
dailySuccessSystem.evening.scoreHelp: Think about effort + focus, not just outcomes. A 60‚Äì80 day is often a win.
dailySuccessSystem.evening.scoreQuestion: How would you rate today overall?
dailySuccessSystem.evening.title: üåô Evening: Reflect & score your day
dailySuccessSystem.freePlan.body: The Daily Success System works great on Free, but Pro will unlock higher AI usage and future automation (auto-generated plans, weekly reports, and more).
dailySuccessSystem.freePlan.label: You're on the Free plan.
dailySuccessSystem.hint.privacy: Your answers and scores are processed by the AI assistant. You can always fine-tune the output directly in the assistant panel.
dailySuccessSystem.hint.tip2: Be honest about distractions and procrastination.
dailySuccessSystem.hint.tip3: Add how you'd like tomorrow to feel.
dailySuccessSystem.hint.title: Hint for best results:
dailySuccessSystem.morning.description: Tell the AI what's on your plate, and it will build a realistic schedule with priorities.
dailySuccessSystem.morning.prioritiesHel: You don't have to fill all three, but at least one priority helps a lot.
dailySuccessSystem.morning.questionToday: Meetings, deadlines, personal tasks, energy level, etc.
dailySuccessSystem.morning.title: üåÖ Morning: Design your day
dailySuccessSystem.morning.top3.label: Top 3 priorities
dailySuccessSystem.streak.help: Days in a row you rated your day 60+.
dailySuccessSystem.streak.label: Success streak (score ‚â• 60)
dailySuccessSystem.subtitle: Start your day with a focused plan, end it with a clear reflection, and track your progress with a simple score.
dailySuccessSystem.title: AI Daily Success System
dailySuccessSystem.todaysScore.heading: Today's score
dailySuccessSystem.todaysScore.help: 0 = terrible day, 100 = perfect day. Be honest, not harsh.

home.features.description: Every page in AI Productivity Hub is a focused tool. No endless widgets ‚Äî just the essentials for days, weeks and long-term goals.

privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how AI Productivity Hub (owned by Anargyros Sgouros) ("we", "our", or "the app") collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our website and services at aiprod.app and our Android app.
privacy.section1.1.body: When you create an account, we collect your email address and securely store your authentication details using Supabase Authentication.
privacy.section1.1.title: 1.1 Account Information
privacy.section1.2.body: We store the content you create in the app, such as notes, tasks, daily planner entries, trips, daily scores, weekly goals and weekly reports. This data is linked to your account and is private to you.
privacy.section1.2.title: 1.2 User-Generated Content
privacy.section1.3.body: We collect limited technical and usage information such as feature usage counts (for AI limits and productivity statistics) and anonymized analytics via Plausible Analytics. We do not use invasive tracking or third-party advertising cookies.
privacy.section1.3.title: 1.3 Usage & Technical Data
privacy.section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
privacy.section2.item1: Provide the core app features (notes, tasks, planner, AI tools)
privacy.section2.item2: Track your daily score and generate weekly reports
privacy.section2.item3: Enforce AI usage limits based on your plan (Free / Pro)
privacy.section2.item4: Process payments and manage subscriptions via Stripe
privacy.section2.item5: Improve stability, performance and user experience
privacy.section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
privacy.section3.body: We do not sell or trade your personal data. We only share data with the following service providers, as needed:
privacy.section3.item1: Supabase ‚Äì authentication, database and secure data storage
privacy.section3.item1.suffix: ‚Äì authentication, database and secure data storage
privacy.section3.item2: Stripe ‚Äì payment processing and subscription billing
privacy.section3.item4: AI provider ‚Äì processing text you send for AI features (we do not use AI outputs for advertising or profiling)
privacy.section3.item4.label: AI provider
privacy.section3.item4.suffix: ‚Äì processing text you send for AI features (we do not use AI outputs for advertising or profiling)
privacy.section3.title: 3. Data Sharing
privacy.section4.body: We retain your data for as long as your account is active. When you request account deletion, we delete your personal data and associated content from our systems within a reasonable timeframe, except where we must retain limited information for legal, billing or security reasons.
privacy.section4.title: 4. Data Retention
privacy.section5.body: All connections to the app use HTTPS encryption. Data is stored in Supabase with row-level security to ensure each user only has access to their own records. No system is perfectly secure, but we take reasonable measures to protect your information.
privacy.section5.title: 5. Security
privacy.section6.body: Depending on your location, you may have rights to access, update or delete your data. You can delete your account at any time using the in-app option or by contacting us. For details, see:
privacy.section6.title: 6. Your Rights
privacy.section7.body: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, contact us at:
privacy.section7.title: 7. Contact
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
settings.dailyDigest.description: Once per day, AI will email you a short summary of recent notes and tasks, plus suggested next steps.
settings.dailyDigest.title: Daily AI email digest
settings.export.description: You can download a copy of your notes and tasks as a Markdown file.
settings.language.description: This changes the app interface language and is used as the default target for the ‚ÄúTranslate with AI‚Äù button.
settings.language.title: Language
settings.mainFocus.label: Main focus area (optional)
settings.mainFocus.placeholder: Example: "Work projects", "University study", "Personal growth", or leave blank.
settings.onboarding.description: Help the app tailor AI prompts, reminders and weekly reports.
settings.onboarding.mainUseLabel: Main way you plan to use this app
settings.onboarding.weekGoalLabel: One important thing you want to make progress on each week
settings.subscription.manage: Manage your subscription, billing details, and invoices in the secure Stripe customer portal.
settings.subtitle: Customize how the AI talks to you and what to focus on.
settings.taskReminders.description: Enable browser notifications for task reminders. You‚Äôll see a notification when a task you set a reminder for is due.
settings.taskReminders.enabled: ‚úÖ Push notifications enabled for this device.
settings.taskReminders.title: Task reminders (push notifications)
settings.theme.description: Choose your app theme. Seasonal themes turn on extra colors.
settings.theme.deviceNote: Your choice is saved on this device. The default theme follows a dark style; Light is easier in bright environments. Seasonal themes (Halloween, Christmas, Easter) add a bit of fun.
settings.title: Settings
settings.weeklyReport.description: Get a weekly AI-generated report with your productivity score, streak, completed tasks, and focus suggestions for next week.
settings.weeklyReport.proOnly: This is a Pro feature. Upgrade to unlock weekly email reports.
tasks.empty: No tasks yet. Add your first one above.
tasks.subtitle: Capture tasks, check them off, and keep track of your progress.
tasks.title: Tasks
templates.howToUse.1: Browse or search for a template by category (Planning, Study, Writing, Work, Personal).
templates.howToUse.2: Click "ü§ñ Use with Assistant" to send the template into the AI Hub Chat. You can tweak the text or add extra details before you hit send.
templates.howToUse.3: Click "View / edit" to open the full template, see the exact prompt, and customize it for your own workflow.
templates.howToUse.4: Templates marked "Pro" are available for Pro / Founder users (or if it's a template you created yourself).
templates.howToUse.5: The more you use a template, the higher it moves in "Trending public templates" on the right side.
templates.howToUse.title: How to use these templates
templates.subtitle: Reusable prompts for planning, focus, study, and writing. Use them with the assistant in one click.
templates.title: AI Templates
templates.trending.tip: Make one of your templates public and use it often to push it into the trending list.
templates.trending.title: üî• Trending public templates
terms.intro: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of AI Productivity Hub ("the app"), including our website at aiprod.app and our Android app. By creating an account or using the app, you agree to these Terms.
terms.section1.body: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for all activity under your account. You must provide accurate information and keep it up to date.
terms.section1.title: 1. Accounts
terms.section2.body: Paid plans (such as Pro) may be offered and are processed via Stripe. Pricing, billing cycles, and benefits are shown in the app. Taxes may apply depending on your location. You can manage or cancel your subscription through the method provided at purchase.
terms.section2.title: 2. Subscriptions and Payments
terms.section3.body: You agree not to misuse the app, interfere with its operation, attempt unauthorized access, or use the app for illegal activities. You also agree not to upload or generate content that violates applicable laws or third-party rights.
terms.section3.title: 3. Acceptable Use
terms.section4.body: You retain ownership of content you create in the app (such as notes, tasks, and plans). You grant us permission to process that content solely to provide and improve the app features, including AI-powered features.
terms.section4.title: 4. User Content
terms.section5.body: AI outputs are generated automatically and may be inaccurate or incomplete. You are responsible for how you use AI outputs. The app is not a substitute for professional advice (medical, legal, financial, or otherwise).
terms.section5.title: 5. AI Features
terms.section6.body: We may modify, suspend, or discontinue parts of the app at any time. We aim to keep the service available but do not guarantee uninterrupted access.
terms.section6.title: 6. Service Availability and Changes
terms.section7.body: You may stop using the app at any time. We may suspend or terminate access if you violate these Terms. You can request account deletion; see the deletion page in the Privacy Policy.
terms.section7.title: 7. Termination
terms.section8.body: To the maximum extent permitted by law, AI Productivity Hub and its owner will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of data, profits, or revenues, arising from your use of the app.
terms.section8.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
terms.section9.body: If you have questions about these Terms, contact us at:
terms.section9.title: 9. Contact
terms.title: Terms of Service
tools.aiTaskCreator.bestFor1: Breaking big projects into small, shippable steps
tools.aiTaskCreator.bestFor2: Planning a study plan, side-project, or new habit
tools.aiTaskCreator.bestFor3: Overcoming procrastination by making the next step tiny and obvious
tools.aiTaskCreator.description: The AI Task Creator is for those moments where you know what you want, but not how to break it down. Paste your goal or brain dump, and AI will propose concrete tasks you can send straight into your Tasks list.
tools.aiTaskCreator.howToUse1: Open the AI Task Creator from the navigation or from the Tasks page link.
tools.aiTaskCreator.howToUse2: Describe your goal or paste your messy notes (e.g. 'I want to redesign my website this month').
tools.aiTaskCreator.howToUse3: Ask AI to generate a list of tasks. Adjust any task titles, add / remove steps until it feels right.
tools.aiTaskCreator.howToUse4: Send the tasks you like directly into your Tasks page, with suggested priorities or time estimates.
tools.aiTaskCreator.name: AI Task Creator
tools.aiTaskCreator.proHint: With Pro, you can use the AI Task Creator more often and for larger projects without worrying about AI limits.
tools.aiTaskCreator.shortTagline: Turn vague goals into small, clear steps.
tools.changelog.description: Curious about new tools, improvements and bug fixes? The What‚Äôs New page (changelog) tracks how the app evolves over time.
tools.changelog.title: What‚Äôs new & release notes
tools.chat.bestFor1: Drafting emails, messages, and content quickly
tools.chat.bestFor2: Brainstorming ideas or breaking down problems with AI
tools.chat.bestFor3: Asking follow-up questions about plans, tasks or notes you‚Äôre working on
tools.chat.description: AI Hub Chat is the place to think out loud with AI. Brainstorm ideas, draft emails, ask questions, or get help with planning‚Äîall without leaving your productivity hub.
tools.chat.howToUse1: Open AI Hub Chat from the navigation bar.
tools.chat.howToUse2: Start typing what you need: a draft, an idea, an outline, or a question.
tools.chat.howToUse3: Iterate with the AI until you‚Äôre happy. You can copy results into Notes, Tasks or Templates.
tools.chat.howToUse4: Save useful prompts as Templates so you can reuse them later with one click.
tools.chat.name: AI Hub Chat
tools.chat.proHint: With Pro, you can use AI Hub Chat more frequently and on longer messages, making it a genuine co-pilot for your work.
tools.chat.shortTagline: Your general-purpose AI assistant inside the workspace.
tools.dailySuccess.bestFor1: Building a gentle, non-obsessive productivity habit
tools.dailySuccess.bestFor2: Seeing how your days trend across weeks and months
tools.dailySuccess.bestFor3: Connecting your mood, tasks and wins to a quick daily check-in
tools.dailySuccess.description: Daily Success is a simple score that reflects how your day went based on your own subjective rating. It helps you see patterns over time without obsessing over perfection.
tools.dailySuccess.howToUse1: At the end of the day (or during your evening reflection), open the Daily Success section from the Dashboard.
tools.dailySuccess.howToUse2: Rate your day from 0‚Äì100 based on how satisfied you feel with your progress.
tools.dailySuccess.howToUse3: Optionally add a quick note about why you gave that score.
tools.dailySuccess.howToUse4: Review your scores over time via Weekly history to spot streaks, slumps and what tends to help.
tools.dailySuccess.name: Daily Success score
tools.dailySuccess.proHint: Your Daily Success scores feed directly into your weekly AI reports, so Pro users get richer insights and better suggestions.
tools.dailySuccess.shortTagline: A tiny 0‚Äì100 score that tracks your days.
tools.dashboard.bestFor1: Starting your day with a quick overview
tools.dashboard.bestFor2: Checking your Daily Success score and streak
tools.dashboard.bestFor3: Jumping into Tasks, Notes, AI Hub Chat or Weekly history from one place
tools.dashboard.description: The dashboard is your home base. It pulls together your daily productivity score, quick links to notes, tasks, travel planner and weekly history so you can see where you stand in a few seconds.
tools.dashboard.howToUse1: Open the dashboard from the top navigation or from the homepage CTA.
tools.dashboard.howToUse2: Glance at your Daily Success score and trend to see how today compares to previous days.
tools.dashboard.howToUse3: Use the quick links to hop into Tasks, Notes, AI Hub Chat or Weekly history depending on what you want to work on.
tools.dashboard.name: Dashboard overview
tools.dashboard.shortTagline: Today at a glance, plus your Daily Success score.
tools.header.subtitle: Think of this as your map. Each section below is a page or feature inside the app ‚Äî what it does, when to use it, and how to get the most value from it.
tools.header.title: Every tool in AI Productivity Hub, explained.
tools.myTrips.bestFor1: Keeping all your trip ideas and plans in one place
tools.myTrips.bestFor2: Reusing an old itinerary for a new trip with tweaks
tools.myTrips.bestFor3: Quickly grabbing hotel or activity suggestions you liked before
tools.myTrips.description: All trips you generate with the Travel Planner are saved in My Trips. You can reopen any itinerary, tweak it with AI, or copy details for bookings and logistics.
tools.myTrips.howToUse1: Open My Trips from the navigation to see all saved itineraries.
tools.myTrips.howToUse2: Click into a trip to view the full AI-generated plan.
tools.myTrips.howToUse3: Regenerate or adjust sections (e.g. food, activities) if your preferences changed.
tools.myTrips.howToUse4: Copy important details into your calendar, booking sites or share them with travel partners.
tools.myTrips.name: My Trips
tools.myTrips.proHint: If you travel often, Pro plus My Trips becomes your personal travel library powered by AI.
tools.myTrips.shortTagline: Manage and revisit all your AI-generated trips.
tools.notes.bestFor2: Meeting notes, call notes, or brain dumps
tools.notes.bestFor3: Creating tasks directly from notes using AI
tools.notes.description: The Notes page gives you a clean space to write. AI can summarize, tidy messy text, translate, or pull out tasks so your notes actually turn into action.
tools.notes.howToUse1: Go to the Notes page from the navigation bar.
tools.notes.howToUse2: Create a new note for today or for a topic (e.g. 'Client calls', 'Ideas', 'Study notes').
tools.notes.howToUse3: Write freely. When you‚Äôre done, use the built-in AI actions to summarize, clean up, or extract tasks.
tools.notes.howToUse4: Send any extracted tasks straight into your Tasks page so you don‚Äôt lose them.
tools.notes.name: Notes & AI workspace
tools.notes.proHint: On Pro, you can lean on AI more heavily for longer notes, drafts, and frequent summaries without hitting limits.
tools.notes.shortTagline: Capture ideas, journal, and let AI clean things up.
tools.planner.bestFor1: Structuring your day when you feel overwhelmed
tools.planner.bestFor2: Turning a messy to-do list into a realistic schedule
tools.planner.bestFor3: Connecting your Daily Success score with concrete actions
tools.planner.description: Start every day with clarity. The Daily Planner helps you review your goals, create an achievable schedule, and use AI to break big goals into actionable tasks you can actually finish.
tools.planner.howToUse1: Open the Daily Planner in the morning or the night before.
tools.planner.howToUse2: Write what you want to focus on and the constraints you have (meetings, energy, time).
tools.planner.howToUse3: Let AI suggest a structured plan with time blocks and priority tasks.
tools.planner.howToUse4: Send tasks directly into the Tasks page and use the Daily Success score to review how it went.
tools.planner.name: Daily Planner
tools.planner.proHint: With Pro, you can lean on the planner more often and let AI handle bigger, more complex planning sessions.
tools.planner.shortTagline: Plan your day with AI-assisted tasks & focus.
tools.settings.bestFor1: Choosing a communication style for the AI (balanced, friendly, direct, etc.)
tools.settings.bestFor2: Turning daily digests and weekly reports on or off
tools.settings.bestFor3: Enabling push notifications for per-task reminders
tools.settings.bestFor4: Changing timezone and picking a theme that feels right
tools.settings.description: Settings is where you tune the experience: AI tone, reminder cadence, email digests, push notifications, timezone and themes (including seasonal ones like Halloween or Christmas).
tools.settings.howToUse2: Pick your preferred AI tone so replies feel more like ‚Äòyou‚Äô.
tools.settings.howToUse3: Turn on or off the daily email digest and weekly AI reports, depending on how many emails you want to receive.
tools.settings.howToUse4: Scroll to the Task reminders (push) section to enable browser notifications and set your timezone in Notification settings.
tools.settings.howToUse5: Experiment with themes (dark, light, ocean, seasonal, etc.) until the app visually fits your taste.
tools.settings.name: Settings, notifications & themes
tools.settings.shortTagline: Control how the app talks to you and looks.
tools.tasks.bestFor1: Planning your day or week with a realistic task list
tools.tasks.bestFor2: Grouping tasks by category (Work, Personal, Health, etc.)
tools.tasks.bestFor3: Setting gentle reminders so tasks don‚Äôt disappear from your brain
tools.tasks.description: Tasks is where you turn ideas into clear, scheduled actions. Add due dates, time windows, categories and optional per-task reminders that can trigger email & browser push notifications.
tools.tasks.howToUse1: Open the Tasks page and add a new task with a short, action-based title (e.g. 'Draft landing copy', '30min walk').
tools.tasks.howToUse2: Optionally set a due date, a time window (From / To), and a category.
tools.tasks.howToUse3: If something really matters, add a reminder time. You‚Äôll get an email and ‚Äî if push is enabled ‚Äî a browser notification.
tools.tasks.howToUse4: Use the view filters (Active / History / All) and category filter to stay focused on what matters right now.
tools.tasks.name: Tasks & reminders
tools.tasks.proHint: Combined with the AI Task Creator and weekly reports, Tasks becomes your central hub for execution.
tools.tasks.shortTagline: Simple but powerful task list with reminders.
tools.templates.bestFor1: Email replies, outreach or customer support
tools.templates.bestFor2: Content outlines, LinkedIn posts, blog ideas
tools.templates.bestFor3: Recurring journaling prompts or daily check-ins
tools.templates.description: Templates let you save your favorite prompts for emails, content, journaling, planning and more. Instead of rewriting the same instructions each time, you click a template and start from a strong base.
tools.templates.howToUse1: Open the Templates page from the navigation.
tools.templates.howToUse2: Browse existing templates for emails, planning, journaling or travel‚Äîor create your own.
tools.templates.howToUse3: Fill in the small input fields (e.g. topic, audience, tone) and run the template with AI.
tools.templates.howToUse4: Save templates you like and reuse them from Notes, AI Hub Chat or directly from the Templates page.
tools.templates.name: AI Templates
tools.templates.proHint: With Pro, you can build a personal library of templates and run them more often without AI limits getting in the way.
tools.templates.shortTagline: Reusable prompts for things you do all the time.
tools.travel.bestFor1: Planning weekend trips or long holidays quickly
tools.travel.bestFor2: Getting ideas for what to see, eat and do in a new city
tools.travel.bestFor3: Creating structured daily itineraries instead of random bookmarks
tools.travel.description: Plan detailed multi-day itineraries in seconds. Get highlights, food recommendations, daily routes, budgets, and prefilled Booking.com links that you can reuse later from My Trips.
tools.travel.howToUse1: Open the Travel Planner and enter your destination, dates, travel style and preferences.
tools.travel.howToUse2: Let AI generate a day-by-day itinerary with activities, food suggestions and logistics.
tools.travel.howToUse3: Edit or regenerate parts you don‚Äôt like until it feels right.
tools.travel.howToUse4: Save the trip so it appears in My Trips, where you can revisit or reuse it anytime.
tools.travel.name: Travel Planner
tools.travel.proHint: Pro is ideal if you plan lots of trips or want richer, more detailed itineraries with multiple alternatives.
tools.weeklyHistory.bestFor1: Reviewing your last week in a few minutes
tools.weeklyHistory.bestFor2: Spotting streaks, slumps and patterns over time
tools.weeklyHistory.bestFor3: Choosing a single focus for the upcoming week
tools.weeklyHistory.description: Weekly history shows your past weekly AI reports, so you can see how your scores, streaks and focus areas evolved. It‚Äôs like a lightweight performance review, written for humans.
tools.weeklyHistory.howToUse1: Open the Weekly history page from the navigation or from Settings.
tools.weeklyHistory.howToUse2: Browse previous weeks to see your scores, highlights, and suggested focus points.
tools.weeklyHistory.howToUse3: At the end of each week, skim your report and choose one key focus for the next week.
tools.weeklyHistory.howToUse4: Use those insights to adjust your tasks and Daily Success habits.
tools.weeklyHistory.name: Weekly AI reports & history
tools.weeklyHistory.proHint: Weekly AI email reports are part of Pro ‚Äî you‚Äôll get them delivered automatically to your inbox.
tools.weeklyHistory.shortTagline: See how your weeks are going over time.
